pages.text: The Prickly Belt is a handy trinket, able to store status effects.$(br2)When the wearer of the belt is harmed by an attacker, they will receive positive and neutral status effects stored in the belt. If a negative effect is stored in the belt, it will instead be applied to the attacker. Both of these functions cost some $(l:bewitchment:introduction/altars#internalme)ME$().
To add a status effect, simply combine the belt with a Potion. The amount of uses is dependent on both duration and amplifier of the used Potion.
